reviewText: Please note, this appears to be a re-release of a previous DVD so make sure you aren't buying duplicate episodes if you do not want to. The original release can be found at the following link: Curious George - Zoo Night & Other Animal Stories This DVD contains 8 episodes from the Curious George cartoon. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD: 1. Zoo Night 2. Curious George's Bunny Hunt 3. Bee Is for Bear 4. Curious George's Home for Pigeons 5. From Scratch 6. Curious George, Dog Counter 7. Squirrel for a Day 8. Curious George Discovers the Poles
